actions.recommendation: Cardiology review suggested - You have Barlow's syndrome with slight swelling of both your legs and slight right axis deviation on your ECG. Please see a cardiologist.
Gastroenterology review and colonoscopy is recommended
Cholesterol high, Blood pressure high, Waist circumference high, BMI in Obese category
Reminder to keep up to date with your Orthopaedic and Urology follow ups and reviews
You are overweight, have high cholesterol levels. Dietician and Biokineticist referrals recommended. Suggest Omega 3 supplement. Please repeat cholesterol in 6/12
Your platelet levels were low - please repeat this reading. Your Vit D level was suboptimal - suggest supplementing with Vit D3 5000iu daily and repeat in 3/12
